title: Boards summoner icon not updating
body: I've changed my icon many times and yet on the boards it never changes. Is that a bug ??

replies.body: Your account has to sync to the boards when you post, so it may not update right away if you're consistently updating icons.  A sync can be prompted, but there's no way to force it.  Hopefully if will be updated in no time if it hasn't already!
My boards icon hasn't changed in nearly a year, but I have changed Summoner Icon (and kept a new one for months on end). :^)
I posted several times and it never updated.
It only took a year but mine finally changed, there is hope on the very very distant horizon for you.

My boards icon hasn't changed since before May 2016 when I started using the Iron Inquisitor icon and then in October switched to the Star Guardian icon. I've posted several times in the last 4 months and it still hasn't changed. People have been complaining about this for at least 9 months, and this is all the advice we've been getting. Some of the people complaining have had theirs change, but mine hasn't, so hopefully you have better luck than me.

We can try to perform a re-sync request, but we can't force it through.  Meaning we can't expedite or provide an estimate for when an icon could be updated because we don't know.  I'm not a developer and not really sure why it can take longer than usual sometimes, but I believe it's something with the backend.  

I've done a re-sync for you just in case, but I can't make any guarantees.  If you have any feedback, do let our boards devs know at the [Boards Feedback](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/site-feedback) section.  Let me know if that clears things up!
